snippet: Ciudad Juárez is still a violent city, but homicide rates have decreased significantly from their peak in 2010, and young people in particular are stepping out.
abstract: Ciudad Juarez Journal; signs of new life appear in the violent border city of Ciudad Juarez, Mex, as homicide rates decrease and young people in particular are stepping out, hosting fashion shows, joining art collectives and partying after dark at reopened nightclubs.
lead_paragraph: Ciudad Juárez is still a violent city, but homicide rates have decreased significantly from their peak in 2010, and young people in particular are stepping out.

headline.seo: Slivers of Hope Amid the Melancholy in Ciudad Juárez
headline.main: Slivers of Hope Amid the Melancholy in a Mexican Border Town
headline.print_headline: Slivers of Hope Amid the Melancholy in a Mexican Border Town
